meta.description:
Haus Toys can manufacture and sell toy trucks, toy planes, toy boats, and toy trains. The profit from selling one truck is $5, from one plane is $10, from one boat is $8, and from one train is $7. How many types of toys should Haus Toys manufacture to maximize profit?

There are 890 units of wood available. Manufacturing one truck requires 12 units of wood, one plane requires 20 units of wood, one boat requires 15 units of wood, and one train requires 10 units of wood.

There are 500 units of steel available. Manufacturing one plane requires 3 units of steel, one boat requires 5 units of steel, one train requires 4 units of steel, and one truck requires 6 units of steel.

If Haus Toys manufactures trucks, then they will not manufacture trains.

However, if they manufacture boats, they will also manufacture planes.

The number of toy boats manufactured cannot exceed the number of toy trains manufactured.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of toy to manufacture

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: quicksum(profit[toy] * x[toy] for toy in Toys)

constraints.name: wood_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(wood_req[toy] * x[toy] for toy in Toys)

constraints.name: steel_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: quicksum(steel_req[toy] * x[toy] for toy in Toys)

constraints.name: truck_train_exclusion
constraints.description: Cannot manufacture both trucks and trains

constraints.name: boat_plane_dependency
constraints.description: If boats are manufactured, planes must also be manufactured

constraints.name: boat_train_limit
constraints.description: Number of boats cannot exceed number of trains

constraints.name: truck_binary_link
constraints.description: Link truck production to binary variable

constraints.name: train_binary_link
constraints.description: Link train production to binary variable

constraints.name: boat_binary_link
constraints.description: Link boat production to binary variable

constraints.name: plane_binary_link
constraints.description: Link plane production to binary variable
